product_name: Lucky Bums Fallline Ski Trainer - Boys'
long_description: Gently control your child's speed and turning while he's learning to ski with the Lucky Bums Fallline ski trainer for boys. System includes an integrated handle, 2 ski leashes and a stow pack. Lift your child after a fall or onto a chairlift with the Grip 'n Guide handle; store a snack or mittens and the handle (when not in use) in the integrated backpack. Two detachable, 7-ft. leashes feature easy-to-use clasps and quick-release buckles. The Lucky Bums Fallline ski trainer features adjustable shoulder and sternum straps that help ensure a stable, comfortable fit.
short_description: Gently control your child's speed and turning while he's learning to ski with the Lucky Bums Fallline ski trainer for boys. System includes an integrated handle, 2 ski leashes and a stow pack.
